Class PhoneBillDAO

java.lang.Object
edu.pdx.cs.joy.whitlock.PhoneBillDAO
public class PhoneBillDAO extends Object
A Data Access Object (DAO) for persisting PhoneBill instances to a database. This is a simple example to demonstrate basic JDBC operations. Students can expand this to include PhoneCall persistence and more sophisticated query capabilities.

      Finds a PhoneBill by customer name.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
